Pre-Game Insights: The Burkina Faso team, known as the Etalons, resumed training on January 25, 2024, after their defeat against Angola.
Sébastien Tou, the fourth goalkeeper of the Etalons, emphasized that the team is now focused on preparing for the match against Mali.
Valentin Nouma, a defender for the Etalons, mentioned that the team has started analyzing Mali's group stage matches.
Sacha Bansé, a defensive midfielder, acknowledged the quality of the Mali team but expressed confidence in Burkina Faso's ability to prepare well for the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: From 2011 to 2021, there have been four confrontations between Mali and Burkina Faso, with Mali winning three times and one match ending in a draw.
